item.title: Fashion’s final frontier: Techno-Couture
item.author: Gabriella Yongue,
item.description: Many of us think that Imperial could not be further removed from the world of fashion, however I’d like to persuade you otherwise. Both fashion and technology are constantly evolving industries; fickle and always in search of the new ‘it’ product to entice buyers into yet another superfluous …

item.title: Mario Testino vs. Kate Moss
item.author: Gabriella Yongue,
item.description: When one of the most renowned fashion photographers collaborates with his muse, it is unsurprising that they should create the most exclusive photographic tome since Helmut Newton’s gargantuan, and aptly named, Sumo. Kate Moss by Mario Testino, printed in extremely limited edition and retailing at …
